job.title: (100% Remote) Site Reliability Engineer
job.description:
Our customer is a SaaS based AI product development startup. Their product automates and personalizes restaurant orders on high-volume voice channels using artificial intelligence (AI).
Title
-
Site Reliability Engineer
Location
- Austin, Texas, United States - Remote till covid
Duration
- Fulltime
Responsibilities
●
Be part of on-call rotation to respond to urgent bugs or production outages
● Proactively identify and fix infrastructure bottlenecks
● Choosing tooling for and understanding of CI / CD
● GCP knowledge
● Kubernetes (In a production environment)
● Docker
● Knowledge of working in an Agile environment
● Infrastructure As Code
● Develop, integrate and support features in the core server stack
● Develop and support data pipeline and infrastructure
Desirable Skills Include
:
● Microservices Architecture
● Go
● Python
● ML Ops
● Should be able to apply different tenants' configuration through code as well as tools.
Experience
●
3-5 years of experience in working with infrastructure as code
● At least 1 year in Python or Golang
● Comfortable developing, maintaining DevOps pipelines
● Strong experience working with cloud services - AWS or GCP preferred
● Exposure to NLP/AI/ML is a huge plus
If interested please email me your resume at anna@avestacs.com
